# Instructions
1. Download and load your selected data set in R.

2. Select the variables, and possibly rows, of interest and run frequency distributions of your chosen variables.

3. Submit the following on Canvas:
    <ul><li> A **.R file** containing all R commands that you used for this assignment. This file should include comments that you make in your R code.
    <li> A **PDF document** that includes output that displays at least three of your variables in frequency tables.
      <ul><li> Describe the results of your frequency tables in a few sentences. This description should include appropriate descriptive statistics.</ul>
    </ul>
